message.body: I wonder if restoring our iphones will make the new OS work better...
Restoring to 5? You can't, there is too much from 6 that gets fragmented and left behind that it impairs operation.
No, i just mean wiping it
Well, im gonna try it, cuz its bein wacky, zapping battery and running slower
Ugh me too. Good luck! It's not like you have to back it up anyway, it should do that every time you've connected it to your computer.
